Shan Shui, literally translates as Mountain Water. A traditional style of Chinese Painting depicting scenery or landscapes using Brush and Ink. Steve Leung has drawn inspiration from these traditional Chinese artworks and gave it a contemporary twist for the luxurious Crystals Editions, presenting pure breathtaking elegance. The finest Swarovski crystals embedded in exquisite leather add refinement to the finish of the octagonal washstand and Squaro Prestige bathtub from Villeroy & Boch. Thousands of alluringly scintillating gems light up the bathroom and invite the user to take an extra moment to take in the inspiring sight.

Octagon Crystals Edition – a masterpiece of precision
Both majestically sublime and elegant, the exclusive premium Octagon Crystals Edition sink towers up from the floor. Hand-finished with more than 1,000 Swarovski Xirius Rose crystals, the freestanding pillar provides a stylish stage for the intricately designed TitanCeram sink.
The octagonal shape of the precisely faceted basin matches perfectly with the fine crystal details. An expressive piece of artistry with a unique character.

Squaro Crystals Edition – like no other. Premium. Elegant.
Bathe in a sea of nearly 5,000 precious Swarovski Xirius Rose crystals – presenting the Squaro Crystals Edition. An exclusive composition of award-winning bathtub design and exquisite materials. Every single crystal is individually applied by hand to the leather surface of the freestanding Squaro Prestige Quaryl® bathtub to create a one-of-a-kind specimen of luxurious elegance that shines with sensual radiance in your bathroom.
